tldr: Affected versions of the package are vulnerable to Remote Code Execution (RCE). `TemplateName` and `globals` JavaScript identifiers are not validated to prevent possible Remote Code Execution (RCE) if untrusted user input is passed to the compilation options.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `pug-code-gen` library to the patch version.
